unnormalised: Arre bhai, sabzi mandi mein ₹50 lekar jaao toh ek thela bharke mirchi milta hai, aur mall mein ₹5000 ka sirf ek designer hand bag! Inflation ho toh aisi ho!
normalised: Arre bhai, sabzi mandi mein rupee fifty lekar jaao toh ek thela bharke mirchi milta hai, aur mall mein rupee five thousand ka sirf ek designer hand bag! Inflation ho toh aisi ho!
